summary: New Mexico is a state in the southwest of the USA. It's known for its diverse landscape, from mountains to deserts. The state has a rich history, once home to ancient Puebloans and later colonized by Spain and Mexico. It became a US state in 1912. New Mexico has a unique culture, being one of the few majority-minority states, with large Hispanic, Latino, and Native American populations. Its capital, Santa Fe, is the oldest state capital in the US. The state is also famous for its role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.
title: New Mexico
